title: Classic X-Men 01 (1986-09) (DobisP.R.-Novus-HD) [NVS-D]
description:
English | CBZ | 38 Pages

Classic X-Men #1
Publisher:  Marvel
Publication Date:  September 1986

Writer:  Chris Claremont (pg 1-4, 18-32); Len Wein (pg 5-17)
Penciller:  John Bolton (pg 1-4, 18-32); Dave Cockrum (pg 5-17)
Inker:  John Bolton (pg 1-4, 18-32); Bob McLeod (pg 5-17)
Colorist:  Glynis Oliver
Letterer:  Tom Orzechowski (pg 1-4, 18-32); John Costanza (pg 5-17)
Cover:  Arthur Adams

The old X-Men are captured by Krakoa, the Living Island, and Professor X forms a new team to rescue them.

Condenses Giant-Size X-Men to fit in 32 pages, with new material on pages 1-4 and 18-32. The rest of the series reprints the original comics in their entirety.

Thanks goes to DobisP.R. for this release.
